shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.

shorts.title: Greater Carbondale YMCA hosts New Year's Eve kids pool party
shorts.title_distilled: Greater Carbondale YMCA hosts New Year's Eve kids pool party.
shorts.description: Kids in Lackawanna County celebrated the New Year a little early with a pool party at the Greater Carbondale YMCA, with a noon ball drop and a toy surprise.

shorts.title: Officials urge drivers to travel safely for New Year's celebrations
shorts.title_distilled: Officials urge drivers to travel safely for New Year's celebrations.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Millions of people are gearing up to celebrate the New Year on Wednesday night, and with that comes the chance of drunk drivers. AAA, as well as bars open for the holiday, are warning against driving impaired. Around the world, people are celebrating the end of 2025 and the start [...]

shorts.title: PSP says Moosic house fire started by family dog
shorts.title_distilled: PSP says Moosic house fire started by family dog.
shorts.description: MOOSIC, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — The PSP fire marshal unit say the Monday afternoon house fire in Moosic was probably caused by the family dog. Officials say an investigation revealed that a knob on the gas stove was turned on, which ignited combustible material on the stove in a home on the 600 block of [...]
